statements: DELETE FROM students WHERE student_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM Class WHERE class_name = 'History' AND class_schedule LIKE '%Monday%';
DELETE FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101 AND enrollment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM class_schedules WHERE schedule_id = 50 AND start_time > '13:00:00' AND course_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Grades WHERE student_id = 1 AND class_id = 100;
DELETE FROM Enrollment WHERE student_id = 101 AND class_id = 201;
DELETE FROM Grades WHERE grade = 'A' AND class_id = 301;
DELETE FROM enrollments WHERE student_id=1 AND class_id=2;
